I recommend this game! I had previous accounts with non-prime and I played so much on public servers! Unfortunately, there are a lot of cheaters, so I bought prime I have only 100 hours in this game, but I played previous in a total of 600-700 hours.
If you want to enjoy your day, then play this game! Very good tactics, shooting and etc.
